TopicTitle: Simple tutorial on "Place Satellite in Orbit" contracts

Articles.Content:
As the video says, it's not intended to be the best or most efficient method, but a very simple one.

It should be noted that it can be viewed in HD on youtube, as opposed to the water color painting quality seen here.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/H2EvNQ7D9_U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
